name: Impulse! - Break kaleidoscope of bricks! Superb retro brick breaker with modern rendered graphics.
name_original: Impulse! - Break kaleidoscope of bricks! Superb retro brick breaker with modern rendered graphics.
description:
Impulse! has a solid 5 star rating in USA App Store!

The Impulse! - is not just rethinking a classic of the genre in a new way. Game Impulse is completely new look on a popular arcade games!

Completely different visual style for the each next level, will delight Your sophisticated look. The melodious sound of your actions will immerse You into a fantastic world of incredible shapes. But the most important thing in any game is the gameplay! Try it and you will be carried away in a whirlwind of emotions: excitement, enjoying the beauty and tranquility of the Zen.
Play, collect the pluses, use power-ups, and break to shreds all carefully drawn levels!

Features:

- Two gameplay modes: arcade and tactic
- The gameplay is based on physical laws
- Perfect modern graphics
- 30 do not like each other level
- Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the game sound effects and music
- 14 unique power-ups with the combination
- Many tactical approaches for the effective passage of
- Easy intuitive control
- And many other surprises await You in the game!

Just play and you can be sure that You would like our Game!

- apppicker.com review: "The Impulse! App for your iPod touch, iPad, and iPhone provides users with a really modern take on the classic game. This one is incredibly addictive, offers up a number of unique levels, and is smooth to play."
